about_the_game:
Bolt Action Stealth is a suspenseful, first-person, alien-eradicating sniper puzzle game. Play as Gary Truman, a war vet turned farmhand, shooting through an onslaught of slimy aliens, toxic pods, and zombie mutants. You must trek over alien-infested terrain, through mutant-crawling suburbs, and dive into the murky city underground to save the girl and free humanity from the dark alien hive that has enslaved it.

Silence is your cover; your rifle is your lifeline. Choose your shot carefully. Exterminate from afar with realistic gun mechanics and long-range bullet physics. Solve puzzles with your aim and use the destructible environments to your advantage.

  • Fifty different levels through five areas, each with a challenging boss
  • Shoot the pods or crush them? Make use of environment-based physics
  • Adjustable level of simulation, from one-touch reload to manual bolt cycling for maximum immersion
  • Developed from the ground up for VR but also playable on a PC
